content:
I manage an Infantry focused Mercenary company that takes contracts for tasks like Station Guard, Body Guarding, Ship Garrison/Patrol, Gunner duty, and most importantly... Assault teams that execute sieges on stations or other targets.

if anyone is interested in these services in any way let me know
thats what i came here to discuss
just a company not a faction
i am also part of a mercenary corporation that should make it easy to get in contact with many different specialized groups
let me know if you ever want to know more or get the link to my group
i shall leave the server, you can dm me (i am near the discord server limit)
